summary: This module implements a chat handler that interfaces with the IBM WatsonX AI service to generate chat completions. It builds and sends HTTP requests, processes responses (including streaming), maps generic parameters to WatsonX-specific formats, and integrates with the Litellm framework by extending an OpenAI‑like chat handler base class.
business_intent: Provide a unified, Litellm‑compatible way for applications to obtain conversational AI outputs from WatsonX, handling request construction, execution, error management, and streaming support.
